name: Avoideroids
description:
This game is just a simple prototype that I was focused on "finishing". The point of the game is just like old school Asteroids, avoid them for as long as possible. More updates to come!

Planned Updates:

- More asteroid sprites and particles! (cuz particles are cool)

- Better ship art and thruster art.

- Sounds: music of sorts, button clicks, thruster, that sorta stuff.

Possible Updates:

- More difficulties (currently the difficulty affects how many asteroids spawn per "wave")

- Death recap that shows stats (score, armor gained, etc)

- Highest score system

Thanks for checking Avoideroids out and if you have any suggests please let me know!
